name: Ghosty (Alpha) v 1.0.2 || MAP UPDATE! ||
description:
vv READ ME!! vv 

Ghosty (Alpha) v1.0.2
Ghosty is a puzzle map game where you are a ghost named Ghosty, and you goal is to reach the end. The only problem is you're in a cave and it is filled with wrong directions and confusion. One wrong turn and you could be back to where you started. 

At the moment the leaderboard is Discord private so if you want your speedrun to mean something then you should join the discord!
https://discord.gg/c7a6Abdh

Whats New?
-New Map, Tileset, and updated features on the map to make the expierience smoother. You can now jump 3 blocks to make speedruns more effecient and overall make the game more unique.
